v8:item.v8:content: Red circle - The line isn't mapped. See the data mapping section for details. Empty green circle - The line is ready to be imported. Filled green circle - The line has been imported.
Attribute name, which has to be mapped
Value of the attribute as it is stated in the bank statement
The value in the Infobase, which corresponds to the bank statement value
Red circle - The line isn't mapped. See the data mapping section for details. Empty green circle - The line is ready to be exported. Filled green circle - The line has been exported.
Attribute name, which has to be mapped
The value in the Infobase, which corresponds to the bank statement value
